issue.title: NullableMapReaderImpl.isSet() always returns true
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-304](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-304). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
NullableMapReaderImpl inherits isSet() from SingleMapReaderImpl and thus always returns true.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-304?focusedCommentId=15526483) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
Thanks for reporting `[~adeneche]`. Did you have an example of how you found that problem? I'm looking for code that uses isSet for ComplexReaders.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-304?focusedCommentId=15526490) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/147

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-304?focusedCommentId=15526878) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
Issue resolved by pull request 147
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/147>
